xmldoc.short_description: Store recorded audio signal in numeric array.

param_input_item.param_description: audiorecorder object: audio recorder object created by audiorecorder.
string or character vector: data type of output audio signal. Valid values: 'double' (default), 'single', 'int16', 'int8', 'uint8'.

param_output_item.param_description: numeric array: audio signal data. Number of columns depends on channel count.

description.p: getaudiodata returns recorded audio data from an audiorecorder object as a numeric array.
y = getaudiodata(recorder) returns the audio data as a double array.
y = getaudiodata(recorder, dataType) returns the audio data converted to the specified data type.
The number of columns in y matches the number of channels in the recording (1 for mono, 2 for stereo).
The value range of y depends on dataType:
